[He]4073-your distinguished partner ca n’t go down to tea like that , [you]131-cyril know . ”[136-the psammead] “ [You]131-cyril see [we]4074-we ca n’t do anything till the 3rd of December , ”[133-anthea] said [Anthea]133-anthea , “ that ’s when [we]4074-we are to find the whole charm . What can [we]4074-we do with [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā till then ? ”[133-anthea] “ [Box‐room]4075-box‐room , ”[131-cyril] said [Cyril]131-cyril briefly , “ and smuggle up [his]243-rekh‐marā meals . It will be rather fun . ”[131-cyril] “ Like [a fleeing Cavalier]4076-a fleeing cavalier concealed from [exasperated Roundheads]4077-exasperated roundheads , ”[132-robert] said [Robert]132-robert . “ Yes . ”[132-robert] So [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā was taken up to [the box‐room]4059-the box‐room and made as comfortable as possible in [a snug nook between [an old nursery fender]2150-an old nursery fender and the wreck of a big four‐poster]2149-a snug nook between an old nursery fender and the wreck of a big four‐poster . [They]2151-they gave [him]243-rekh‐marā a big rag‐bag to sit on , and an old , moth‐eaten fur coat off the nail on the door to keep [him]243-rekh‐marā warm . And when [they]2151-they had had [their]2151-they own tea [they]2151-they took [him]243-rekh‐marā some . [He]243-rekh‐marā did not like the tea at all , but [he]243-rekh‐marā liked the bread and butter , and cake that went with it . [They]2151-they took it in turns to sit with [him]243-rekh‐marā during the evening , and left [him]243-rekh‐marā fairly happy and quite settled for the night . But when [they]2151-they went up in the morning with a kipper , a quarter of which each of [them]2151-they had gone without at breakfast , [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā was gone ! There was the cosy corner with the rag‐bag , and the moth‐eaten fur coat — but the cosy corner was empty . “ Good riddance ! ”[243-rekh‐marā] was naturally the first delightful thought in each mind . The second was less pleasing , because [every one]2347-every one at once remembered that since [his]243-rekh‐marā Amulet had been swallowed up by theirs — which hung once more round the neck of [Jane]134-jane — [he]243-rekh‐marā could have no possible means of returning to [his]243-rekh‐marā Egyptian past . Therefore [he]243-rekh‐marā must be still in [England]8-england , and probably somewhere quite near [them]2151-they , plotting mischief . [The attic]2153-the attic was searched , to prevent mistakes , but quite vainly . “ The best thing [we]2151-they can do , ”[131-cyril] said [Cyril]131-cyril , “ is to go through the half Amulet straight away , get the whole Amulet , and come back . ”[131-cyril] “ [I]133-anthea do n’t know , ”[133-anthea] [Anthea]133-anthea hesitated . “ Would that be quite fair ? Perhaps [he]243-rekh‐marā is n’t really [a base deceiver]4078-a base deceiver . Perhaps something ’s happened to [him]243-rekh‐marā . ”[133-anthea] “ Happened ? ”[131-cyril] said [Cyril]131-cyril , “ not it ! Besides , what could happen ? ”[131-cyril] “ [I]133-anthea do n’t know , ”[133-anthea] said [Anthea]133-anthea . “ [Perhaps burglars]4079-perhaps burglars came in the night , and accidentally killed [him]243-rekh‐marā , and took away the — all that was mortal of [him]243-rekh‐marā , [you]4080-you know — to avoid discovery . ”[133-anthea] “ Or perhaps , ”[131-cyril] said [Cyril]131-cyril , “ [they]2151-they hid the — all that was mortal , in one of those big trunks in [the box‐room]4059-the box‐room . Shall [we]2151-they go back and look ? ? ”[131-cyril] [he]131-cyril added grimly . “ No , no ! ”[131-cyril] [Jane]134-jane shuddered . “ Let ’s go and tell [the Psammead]136-the psammead and see what it says . ”[134-jane] “ No , ”[133-anthea] said [Anthea]133-anthea , “ let [’s]2151-they ask [the learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman . If anything has happened to [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā [a gentleman]526-a gentleman ’s advice would be more useful than a Psammead ’s . And [the learned gentleman’ll]4084-the learned gentleman’ll only think it ’s a dream , like [he]2353-the learned gentleman always does . ”[133-anthea] [They]2154-they tapped at the door , and on the “ Come in ”[134-jane] entered . [The learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman was sitting in front of [his]2353-the learned gentleman untasted breakfast . Opposite [him]2353-the learned gentleman , in the easy chair , sat [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā ! “ Hush ! ”[2353-the learned gentleman] said [the learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman very earnestly , “ please , hush ! or the dream will go . [I]2353-the learned gentleman am learning ... Oh , what have [I]2353-the learned gentleman not learned in the last hour ! ”[2353-the learned gentleman] “ In the grey dawn , ”[3339-the priest] said [the Priest]3339-the priest , “ [I]3339-the priest left [[my]3339-the priest hiding‐place]4085-my hiding‐place , and finding [myself]3339-the priest among these treasures from [[my]3339-the priest own country]4086-my own country , [I]3339-the priest remained . [I]3339-the priest feel more at [home]357-home [here]2247-here somehow . ”[3339-the priest] “ Of course [I]2353-the learned gentleman know it ’s a dream , ”[2353-the learned gentleman] said [the learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman feverishly , “ but , oh , [ye]278-the children gods ! what a dream ! By [Jove]128-jove ! ... ”[2353-the learned gentleman] “ Call not upon [the gods]3714-the gods , ”[3339-the priest] said [the Priest]3339-the priest , “ lest [ye]278-the children raise greater ones than [ye]278-the children can control . Already , ”[3339-the priest] [he]3339-the priest explained to [the children]278-the children , “ [he]2353-the learned gentleman and [I]3339-the priest are as [brothers]2863-brothers , and [his]2353-the learned gentleman welfare is dear to [me]3339-the priest as [my]3339-the priest own . ”[3339-the priest] “ [He]2353-the learned gentleman has told [me]2353-the learned gentleman , ”[2353-the learned gentleman] [the learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman began , but [Robert]132-robert interrupted . This was no moment for manners . “ Have [you]3339-the priest told [him]2353-the learned gentleman , ”[3339-the priest] [he]3339-the priest asked [the Priest]3339-the priest , “ all about the Amulet ? ”[3339-the priest] “ No , ”[243-rekh‐marā] said [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā . “ Then tell [him]2353-the learned gentleman now . [He]2353-the learned gentleman is very learned . Perhaps [he]2353-the learned gentleman can tell [us]278-the children what to do . ”[243-rekh‐marā] [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā hesitated , then told — and , oddly enough , [none of [the children]278-the children]3449-none of the children ever could remember afterwards what it was that [he]243-rekh‐marā did tell . Perhaps [he]243-rekh‐marā used some magic to prevent [their]278-the children remembering . When [he]243-rekh‐marā had done [the learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman was silent , leaning [his]2353-the learned gentleman elbow on the table and [his]2353-the learned gentleman head on [his]2353-the learned gentleman hand . “ [Dear Jimmy]219-jimmy , ”[133-anthea] said [Anthea]133-anthea gently , “ do n’t worry about it . [We]4091-we are sure to find it today , somehow . ”[133-anthea] “ Yes , ”[243-rekh‐marā] said [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā , “ and perhaps , with it , [Death]268-death . ”[243-rekh‐marā] “ It ’s to bring [us]4091-we [our]4091-we hearts ’ desire , ”[132-robert] said [Robert]132-robert . “ Who knows , ”[3339-the priest] said [the Priest]3339-the priest , “ what things undreamed‐of and infinitely desirable lie beyond the dark gates ? ”[3339-the priest] “ Oh , do n’t , ”[134-jane] said [Jane]134-jane , almost whimpering . [The learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman raised [his]2353-the learned gentleman head suddenly . “ Why not , ”[2353-the learned gentleman] [he]2353-the learned gentleman suggested , “ go back into [the Past]20-the past ? At a moment when the Amulet is unwatched . Wish to be with it , and that it shall be under [your]243-rekh‐marā hand . ”[2353-the learned gentleman] It was the simplest thing in [the world]294-the world ! And yet none of [them]2169-them had ever thought of it . “ Come , ”[243-rekh‐marā] cried [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā , leaping up . “ Come now ! ”[243-rekh‐marā] “ May — may [I]2353-the learned gentleman come ? ”[2353-the learned gentleman] [the learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman timidly asked . “ It ’s only a dream , [you]243-rekh‐marā know . ”[2353-the learned gentleman] “ Come , and welcome , oh brother , ”[243-rekh‐marā] [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā was beginning , but [Cyril]131-cyril and [Robert]132-robert with one voice cried , “ No . ”[132-robert] “ [You]243-rekh‐marā were n’t with [us]4092-we in [Atlantis]69-atlantis , ”[132-robert] [Robert]132-robert added , “ or [you]243-rekh‐marā ’d know better than to let [him]2353-the learned gentleman come . ”[132-robert] “ [Dear Jimmy]219-jimmy , ”[133-anthea] said [Anthea]133-anthea , “ please do n’t ask to come . [We]4092-we ’ll go and be back again before [you]219-jimmy have time to know that [we]4092-we ’re gone . ”[133-anthea] “ And [he]2353-the learned gentleman , too ? ”[132-robert] “ [We]4092-we must keep together , ”[243-rekh‐marā] said [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā , “ since there is but one perfect Amulet to which [I]243-rekh‐marā and [these children]2807-these children have equal claims . ”[243-rekh‐marā] [Jane]134-jane held up the Amulet — [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā went first — and [they]2171-they all passed through the great arch into which the Amulet grew at the Name of Power . [The learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman saw through the arch a darkness lighted by smoky gleams . [He]2353-the learned gentleman rubbed [his]2353-the learned gentleman eyes . And [he]2353-the learned gentleman only rubbed them for ten seconds . [The children]278-the children and [the Priest]3339-the priest were in [a small , dark chamber]2175-a small , dark chamber . [A square doorway of massive stone]2176-a square doorway of massive stone let in gleams of shifting light , and the sound of many voices chanting a slow , strange hymn . [They]2171-they stood listening . Now and then the chant quickened and the light grew brighter , as though fuel had been thrown on a fire . “ Where are [we]2171-they ? ”[133-anthea] whispered [Anthea]133-anthea . “ And when ? ”[132-robert] whispered [Robert]132-robert . “ This is [some shrine near the beginnings of belief]4094-some shrine near the beginnings of belief , ”[2177-the egyptian shivering] said [the Egyptian shivering]2177-the egyptian shivering . “ Take the Amulet and come away . It is cold here in the morning of [the world]294-the world . ”[2177-the egyptian shivering] And then [Jane]134-jane felt that [her]134-jane hand was on a slab or table of stone , and , under [her]134-jane hand , something that felt like the charm that had so long hung round [her]134-jane neck , only it was thicker . Twice as thick . “ It ’s here ! ”[134-jane] [she]134-jane said , “ [I]134-jane ’ve got it ! ”[134-jane] And [she]134-jane hardly knew the sound of [her]134-jane own voice . “ Come away , ”[243-rekh‐marā] repeated [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā . “ [I]132-robert wish [we]4096-we could see more of [this Temple]4097-this temple , ”[132-robert] said [Robert]132-robert resistingly . “ Come away , ”[3339-the priest] [the Priest]3339-the priest urged , “ there is death all about , and strong magic . Listen . ”[3339-the priest] The chanting voices seemed to have grown louder and fiercer , and light stronger . “ [They]4098-they are coming ! ”[243-rekh‐marā] cried [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā . “ Quick , quick , the Amulet ! ”[243-rekh‐marā] [Jane]134-jane held it up . “ What a long time [you]134-jane ’ve been rubbing [your]134-jane eyes ! ”[133-anthea] said [Anthea]133-anthea ; “ do n’t [you]134-jane see [we]4096-we ’ve got back ? ”[133-anthea] [The learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman merely stared at [her]134-jane . “ [Miss Anthea]133-anthea — [Miss Jane]134-jane ! ”[2180-it] [It]2180-it was [Nurse]142-old nurse ’s voice , very much higher and squeaky and more exalted than usual . “ Oh , bother ! ”[2347-every one] said [every one]2347-every one . [Cyril]131-cyril adding , “ [You]134-jane just go on with the dream for a sec , [Mr. Jimmy]270-mr. jimmy , [we]4096-we ’ll be back directly . [Nurse’ll]271-nurse’ll come up if [we]4096-we do n’t . [She]142-old nurse would n’t think [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā was a dream . ”[131-cyril] Then [they]2182-they went down . [Nurse]142-old nurse was in [the hall]1660-the hall , an orange envelope in one hand , and a pink paper in the other . “ [[Your]134-jane Pa]4099-your pa and [Ma ’s]4100-ma ’s come [home]357-home . ‘ Reach [London]2-london 11.15 . Prepare [rooms]4102-rooms as directed in letter , ’ and signed in [their]2182-they two names . ”[142-old nurse] “ Oh , hooray ! hooray ! hooray ! ”[313-the boys] shouted [the boys]313-the boys and [Jane]134-jane . But [Anthea]133-anthea could not shout , [she]133-anthea was nearer crying . “ Oh , ”[133-anthea] [she]133-anthea said almost in a whisper , “ then it was true . And [we]4096-we have got [our]4096-we hearts ’ desire . ”[133-anthea] “ But [I]142-old nurse do n’t understand about the letter , ”[142-old nurse] [Nurse]142-old nurse was saying . “ [I]133-anthea have n’t had no letter . ”[133-anthea] “ Oh ! ”[134-jane] said [Jane]134-jane in a queer voice , “ [I]134-jane wonder whether it was one of those ... [they]4103-they came that night — [you]4104-you know , when [we]4096-we were playing “[134-jane] devil in the dark”—and [I]133-anthea put them in the hat‐stand drawer , behind the clothes‐brushes and”—she[133-anthea] pulled out the drawer as [she]142-old nurse spoke—“and here they are ! ”[133-anthea] There was a letter for [Nurse]142-old nurse and one for [the children]278-the children . The letters told how [Father]137-father had done being [a war‐correspondent]2186-a war‐correspondent and was coming [home]357-home ; and how [Mother]138-mother and [The Lamb]145-the lamb were going to meet [him]137-father in [Italy]129-italy and all come [home]357-home together ; and how [The Lamb]145-the lamb and [Mother]138-mother were quite well ; and how a telegram would be sent to tell the day and the hour of [their]2189-their home‐coming . “ Mercy [me]305-old nurse ! ”[305-old nurse] said [old Nurse]305-old nurse . “ [I]305-old nurse declare if it ’s not too bad of [you]134-jane , [Miss Jane]134-jane . [I]305-old nurse shall have a nice to‐do getting things straight for [your]134-jane Pa and [Ma]272-ma . ”[305-old nurse] “ Oh , never mind , [Nurse]4105-nurse , ”[134-jane] said [Jane]134-jane , hugging [her]305-old nurse ; “ is n’t it just too lovely for anything ! ”[134-jane] “ [We]131-cyril ’ll come and help [you]134-jane , ”[131-cyril] said [Cyril]131-cyril . “ There ’s just something [upstairs]445-upstairs [we]131-cyril ’ve got to settle up , and then [we]131-cyril ’ll all come and help [you]134-jane . ”[131-cyril] “ Get along with [you]134-jane , ”[305-old nurse] said [old Nurse]305-old nurse , but [she]305-old nurse laughed jollily . “ Nice help [you]134-jane ’d be . [I]305-old nurse know [you]134-jane . And it ’s ten o’clock now . ”[305-old nurse] There was , in fact , something [upstairs]445-upstairs that [they]2193-they had to settle . Quite a considerable something , too . And it took much longer than [they]2193-they expected . A hasty rush into [[the boys]313-the boys ’ room]2195-the boys ’ room secured [the Psammead]136-the psammead , very sandy and very cross . “ It does n’t matter how cross and sandy it is though , ”[133-anthea] said [Anthea]133-anthea , “ it ought to be there at the final council . ”[133-anthea] “ It ’ll give [the learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman fits , [I]132-robert expect , ”[132-robert] said [Robert]132-robert , “ when [he]2353-the learned gentleman sees it . ”[132-robert] But it did n’t . “ The dream is growing more and more wonderful , ”[132-robert] [he]132-robert exclaimed , when [the Psammead]136-the psammead had been explained to [him]132-robert by [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā . “ [I]132-robert have dreamed this beast before . ”[132-robert] “ Now , ”[132-robert] said [Robert]132-robert , “ [Jane]134-jane has got the half Amulet and [I]132-robert ’ve got the whole . Show up , [Jane]134-jane . ”[132-robert] [Jane]134-jane untied the string and laid [her]134-jane half Amulet on the table , littered with dusty papers , and the clay cylinders marked all over with little marks like the little prints of birds ’ little feet . [Robert]132-robert laid down the whole Amulet , and [Anthea]133-anthea gently restrained the eager hand of [the learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman as it reached out yearningly towards the “ perfect specimen . ”[2353-the learned gentleman] And then , just as before on the Marcella quilt , so now on the dusty litter of papers and curiosities , the half Amulet quivered and shook , and then , as steel is drawn to a magnet , it was drawn across the dusty manuscripts , nearer and nearer to the perfect Amulet , warm from the pocket of [Robert]132-robert . And then , as one drop of water mingles with another when the panes of the window are wrinkled with rain , as one bead of mercury is drawn into another bead , the half Amulet , that was [the children]278-the children ’s and was also [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā ’s , slipped into the whole Amulet , and , behold ! there was only one — the perfect and ultimate Charm . “ And that ’s all right , ”[400-the psammead] said [the Psammead]400-the psammead , breaking a breathless silence . “ Yes , ”[133-anthea] said [Anthea]133-anthea , “ and [we]4108-we ’ve got [our]4108-we hearts ’ desire . [Father]137-father and [Mother]138-mother and [The Lamb]145-the lamb are coming [home]357-home today . ”[133-anthea] “ But what about [me]243-rekh‐marā ? ”[243-rekh‐marā] said [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā . “ What is [your]243-rekh‐marā heart ’s desire ? ”[133-anthea] [Anthea]133-anthea asked . “ Great and deep learning , ”[3339-the priest] said [the Priest]3339-the priest , without a moment ’s hesitation . “ A learning greater and deeper than that of [any man of [[my]3339-the priest land]4111-my land and [my]3339-the priest time]4110-any man of my land and my time . But learning too great is useless . If [I]3339-the priest go back to [[my]3339-the priest own land]4112-my own land and [my]3339-the priest own age , who will believe [my]3339-the priest tales of what [I]3339-the priest have seen in the future ? Let [me]3339-the priest stay here , be [the great knower of all that has been]4113-the great knower of all that has been , in that [our]4114-our time , so living to [me]3339-the priest , so old to [you]243-rekh‐marā , about which [[your]243-rekh‐marā learned men]4115-your learned men speculate unceasingly , and often , [he]4115-your learned men tells [me]3339-the priest , vainly . ”[3339-the priest] “ If [I]136-the psammead were [you]243-rekh‐marā , ”[136-the psammead] said [the Psammead]136-the psammead , “ [I]136-the psammead should ask the Amulet about that . It ’s a dangerous thing , trying to live in a time that ’s not [your]243-rekh‐marā own . [You]243-rekh‐marā ca n’t breathe an air that ’s thousands of centuries ahead of [your]243-rekh‐marā lungs without feeling the effects of it , sooner or later . Prepare the mystic circle and consult the Amulet . ”[136-the psammead] “ Oh , what a dream ! ”[2353-the learned gentleman] cried [the learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman . “ [Dear children]889-dear children , if [you]889-dear children love [me]2353-the learned gentleman — and [I]2353-the learned gentleman think [you]889-dear children do , in dreams and out of [them]4117-them — prepare the mystic circle and consult the Amulet ! ”[2353-the learned gentleman] [They]2201-they did . As once before , when the sun had shone in August splendour , [they]2201-they crouched in a circle on the floor . Now the air outside was thick and yellow with the fog that by some strange decree always attends the Cattle Show week . And in [the street]481-the street [costers]2203-costers were shouting . “ [Ur Hekau Setcheh]152-ur hekau setcheh , ”[134-jane] [Jane]134-jane said the Name of Power . And instantly the light went out , and all the sounds went out too , so that there was a silence and a darkness , both deeper than any darkness or silence that [you]2204-you have ever even dreamed of imagining . It was like being deaf or blind , only darker and quieter even than that . Then out of that vast darkness and silence came a light and a voice . The light was too faint to see anything by , and the voice was too small for [you]2204-you to hear what it said . But the light and the voice grew . And the light was the light that [no man]1330-no man may look on and live , and the voice was the sweetest and most terrible voice in [the world]294-the world . [The children]278-the children cast down [their]278-the children eyes . And so did [every one]2347-every one . “ [I]2425-the voice speak , ”[2425-the voice] said [the voice]2425-the voice . “ What is it that [you]889-dear children would hear ? ”[2425-the voice] There was a pause . [Every one]2347-every one was afraid to speak . “ What are [we]2201-they to do about [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā ? ”[132-robert] said [Robert]132-robert suddenly and abruptly . “ Shall [he]243-rekh‐marā go back through the Amulet to [his]243-rekh‐marā own time , or — ”[132-robert] “ [No one]344-no one can pass through the Amulet now , ”[2211-the beautiful , terrible voice] said [the beautiful , terrible voice]2211-the beautiful , terrible voice , “ to [any land]4119-any land or any time . Only when it was imperfect could such things be . But [men]2526-men may pass through the perfect charm to the perfect union , which is not of time or space . ”[2211-the beautiful , terrible voice] “ Would [you]889-dear children be so very kind , ”[133-anthea] said [Anthea]133-anthea tremulously , “ as to speak so that [we]2201-they can understand [you]889-dear children ? [The Psammead]136-the psammead said something about [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā not being able to live [here]2247-here , and if [he]243-rekh‐marā ca n’t get back — ”[133-anthea] [She]133-anthea stopped , [her]133-anthea heart was beating desperately in [her]133-anthea throat , as it seemed . “ [Nobody]2255-nobody can continue to live in [a land]4123-a land and in [a time not appointed]4124-a time not appointed , ”[2212-the voice of glorious sweetness] said [the voice of glorious sweetness]2212-the voice of glorious sweetness . “ But a soul may live , if in that other time and [land]4125-land there be found a soul so akin to it as to offer [it]4126-it refuge , in the body of [that land]4127-that land and time , that thus [they]278-the children two may be [one soul in one body]4128-one soul in one body . ”[2212-the voice of glorious sweetness] [The children]278-the children exchanged discouraged glances . But the eyes of [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā and [the learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman met , and were kind to [each other]312-each other , and promised [each other]312-each other many things , secret and sacred and very beautiful . [Anthea]133-anthea saw the look . “ Oh , but , ”[133-anthea] [she]133-anthea said , without at all meaning to say it , “ [dear [Jimmy]270-mr. jimmy ’s soul]4129-dear jimmy ’s soul is n’t at all like [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā ’s . [I]133-anthea ’m certain it is n’t . [I]133-anthea do n’t want to be rude , but it is n’t , [you]132-robert know . [Dear Jimmy]219-jimmy ’s soul is as good as gold , and — ”[133-anthea] “ Nothing that is not good can pass beneath the double arch of [my]2425-the voice perfect Amulet , ”[2425-the voice] said [the voice]2425-the voice . “ If both are willing , say the word of Power , and let [the two souls]4130-the two souls become one for ever and ever more . ”[2425-the voice] “ Shall [I]134-jane ? ”[134-jane] asked [Jane]134-jane . “ Yes . ”[2425-the voice] “ Yes . ”[2101-the egyptian priest] The voices were those of [the Egyptian Priest]2101-the egyptian priest and [the learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman , and the voices were eager , alive , thrilled with hope and the desire of great things . [So Jane]134-jane took the Amulet from [Robert]132-robert and held it up between [the two men]2220-the two men , and said , for the last time , the word of Power . “ Ur Hekau Setcheh . ”[134-jane] The perfect Amulet grew into a double arch ; the two arches leaned to each other making a great A. “ A. stands for Amen , ”[134-jane] whispered [Jane]134-jane ; “ what [he]2353-the learned gentleman was [a priest of]4131-a priest of . ”[134-jane] “ Hush ! ”[133-anthea] breathed [Anthea]133-anthea . [The great double arch]2221-the great double arch glowed in and through the green light that had been there since the Name of Power had first been spoken — it glowed with a light more bright yet more soft than the other light — a glory and splendour and sweetness unspeakable . “ Come ! ”[243-rekh‐marā] cried [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā , holding out [his]243-rekh‐marā hands . “ Come ! ”[2353-the learned gentleman] cried [the learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman , and [he]2353-the learned gentleman also held out [his]2353-the learned gentleman hands . [Each]2447-each moved forward under the glowing , glorious arch of the perfect Amulet . Then [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā quavered and shook , and as steel is drawn to a magnet [he]243-rekh‐marā was drawn , under the arch of magic , nearer and nearer to [the learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman . And , as one drop of water mingles with another , when the window‐glass is rain‐wrinkled , as one quick‐silver bead is drawn to [another quick‐silver bead]2225-another quick‐silver bead , [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā , [Divine Father of the Temple of Amen‐Rā]2226-divine father of the temple of amen‐rā , was drawn into , slipped into , disappeared into , and was one with [Jimmy]219-jimmy , the good , [the beloved]2227-the beloved , [the learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman . And suddenly it was good daylight and the December sun shone . The fog has passed away like a dream . The Amulet was there — little and complete in [Jane]134-jane ’s hand , and there were [the other children]3097-the other children and [the Psammead]136-the psammead , and [the learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman . But [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā — or the body of [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā — was not there any more . As for [his]243-rekh‐marā soul ... “ Oh , the horrid thing ! ”[132-robert] cried [Robert]132-robert , and put [his]132-robert foot on a centipede as long as [your]2231-your finger , that crawled and wriggled and squirmed at [the learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman ’s feet . “ That , ”[136-the psammead] said [the Psammead]136-the psammead , “ was the evil in the soul of [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā . ”[136-the psammead] There was a deep silence . “ Then [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā ’s [him]243-rekh‐marā now ? ”[134-jane] said [Jane]134-jane at last . “ All that was good in Rekh‐marā , ”[136-the psammead] said [the Psammead]136-the psammead . “ [He]243-rekh‐marā ought to have [his]243-rekh‐marā heart ’s desire , too , ”[133-anthea] said [Anthea]133-anthea , in a sort of stubborn gentleness . “ [His]243-rekh‐marā heart ’s desire , ”[136-the psammead] said [the Psammead]136-the psammead , “ is the perfect Amulet [you]2231-your hold in [your]2231-your hand . Yes — and has been ever since [he]243-rekh‐marā first saw the broken half of it . ”[136-the psammead] “ [We]2233-we ’ve got [ours]2233-we , ”[133-anthea] said [Anthea]133-anthea softly . “ Yes , ”[136-the psammead] said [the Psammead]136-the psammead — its voice was crosser than [they]2233-we had ever heard [it—“your parents]4132-it—“your parents are coming [home]357-home . And what ’s to become of [me]136-the psammead ? [I]136-the psammead shall be found out , and made a show of , and degraded in every possible way . [I]136-the psammead know [they]4132-it—“your parents ’ll make [me]136-the psammead go into [Parliament]130-parliament — [hateful place]4134-hateful place — all mud and no sand . [That beautiful Baalbec temple in [the desert]553-the desert]4135-that beautiful baalbec temple in the desert ! [Plenty of good sand there]4137-plenty of good sand there , and no politics ! [I]136-the psammead wish [I]136-the psammead were [there]321-there , safe in [the Past]20-the past — that [I]136-the psammead do . ”[136-the psammead] “ [I]2353-the learned gentleman wish [you]133-anthea were , ”[2353-the learned gentleman] said [the learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman absently , yet polite as ever . [The Psammead]136-the psammead swelled itself up , turned its long snail ’s eyes in one last lingering look at [Anthea]133-anthea — a loving look , [she]133-anthea always said , and thought — and — vanished . “ Well , ”[133-anthea] said [Anthea]133-anthea , after a silence , “ [I]133-anthea suppose it ’s happy . The only thing it ever did really care for was sand . ”[133-anthea] “ [[My]2353-the learned gentleman dear children]4139-my dear children , ”[2353-the learned gentleman] said [the learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman , “ [I]2353-the learned gentleman must have fallen asleep . [I]2353-the learned gentleman ’ve had the most extraordinary dream . ”[2353-the learned gentleman] “ [I]131-cyril hope it was a nice one , ”[131-cyril] said [Cyril]131-cyril with courtesy . “ Yes .... [I]131-cyril feel [a new man]4140-a new man after it . Absolutely [a new man]4140-a new man . ”[131-cyril] There was a ring at the front‐door bell . The opening of a door . Voices . “ It ’s [them]4142-them ! ”[132-robert] cried [Robert]132-robert , and a thrill ran through four hearts . “ Here ! ”[133-anthea] cried [Anthea]133-anthea , snatching the Amulet from [Jane]134-jane and pressing it into the hand of [the learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman . “ Here — it ’s [yours]4143-you — [your]4143-you very own — a present from [us]4144-us , because [you]4143-you ’re [Rekh‐marā]243-rekh‐marā as well as ... [I]133-anthea mean , because [you]4143-you ’re such [a dear]441-a dear . ”[133-anthea] [She]133-anthea hugged [him]2353-the learned gentleman briefly but fervently , and [the four]3758-the four swept down [the stairs]847-the stairs to [the hall]1660-the hall , where [a cabman]2240-a cabman was bringing in boxes , and where , heavily disguised in travelling cloaks and wraps , was [their]3758-the four hearts ’ desire — three‐fold — [Mother]138-mother , [Father]137-father , and [The Lamb]145-the lamb . “ Bless [me]2353-the learned gentleman ! ”[2353-the learned gentleman] said [the learned gentleman]2353-the learned gentleman , left alone , “ bless [me]2353-the learned gentleman ! What a treasure ! [The dear children]4146-the dear children ! It must be [their]4146-the dear children affection that has given [me]2353-the learned gentleman these luminous aperçus . [I]2353-the learned gentleman seem to see so many things now — things [I]2353-the learned gentleman never saw before ! [The dear children]4146-the dear children ! [The dear , dear children]4148-the dear , dear children ! ”[2353-the learned gentleman]
